About Me

Always have the intention to please God, married to a wonderful woman, Angelyn and we're blessed with two sons. Test and Equipment Engineering are my forte. I love to play basketball, computer games and develop a new passion for coding.

Cognex Corp- Singapore

Senior Test Engineer - 2014 to present

Do all the hands on field service related matters to all equipment deployed in our Contract Manufacturer

Pt. Sanmina- Indonesia

Senior Test Engineer - 2013 to 2014

Lead a group of Engineers and Technician that provides test equipment related support to 3 production floors 24 hours shift operation

Pt. PCI Elektronik - Indonesia

Lead Test Engineer - 2014 to 2013

Lead a group of Engineers and Technician that provides test equipment related and failure analysis support to 24 hours shift production operation
